step_feedback.feedback: You performed the inhalation step well, showing good muscle engagement.  Keep visualizing the fluid movement towards your chest.
Good job placing your hands on your abdomen. Remember to exhale slowly and completely, visualizing the fluid moving out.
While your inhalation was good, focus on tightening all your body muscles more consistently during this step.  Visualize the fluid moving to your chest.
The muscle relaxation during exhalation needs more attention. Try to fully relax your muscles and visualize pushing the fluid out completely.

exercise_summary: You did a good job with the deep breathing exercise! Remember to fully engage your muscles during inhalation and completely relax them during exhalation, visualizing fluid movement in both phases.  Focus on consistent muscle control throughout each breath.
